questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST important to consider when managing changes to the provision of services by a third party that processes personal data?

choices.B: Updates to data life cycle policy
choices.C: Business impact due to the changes

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Business impact due to the changes is the most important consideration when managing changes to third-party services that process personal data. Understanding how these changes affect data privacy, security, and compliance is crucial for effective risk management and ensuring that personal data remains protected

Selected Answer: C
C. Business impact due to the changes.

comments.content: C. Business impact due to the changes.

discussion.content: B. Updates to data life cycle policy

questions.question_text: Which of the following techniques mitigates design flaws in the application development process that may contribute to potential leakage of personal data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Software hardening involves strengthening the security of an application by reducing its attack surface, removing unnecessary features, applying secure configurations, and addressing potential vulnerabilities that could be exploited.

Selected Answer: C
C is the right answer. UAT is primarily concerned with functional testing and not coding or privacy issues.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the PRIMARY reason that a single cryptographic key should be used for only one purpose, such as encryption or authentication?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Using a single cryptographic key for only one purpose ensures that if the key is compromised, the scope of the potential damage is limited.

choices.B: It minimizes the risk if the cryptographic key is compromised.
choices.D: Each process can only be supported by its own unique key management process.
choices.C: It is more practical and efficient to use a single cryptographic key.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Yep - B. Development

questions.question_text: During which of the following system lifecycle stages is it BEST to conduct a privacy impact assessment (PIA) on a system that holds personal data?

choices.B: To evaluate effectiveness of data controls

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the PRIMARY reason that organizations need to map the data flows of personal data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Mapping data flows is essential for understanding how personal data moves through an organization, including where it is collected, processed, stored, shared, and transferred.
